input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineering Lead

Location: Boca Raton, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About The Business

LexisNexis® Risk Solutions provides customers with solutions and decision tools that combine public and industry specific content with advanced technology and analytics to assist them in evaluating and predicting risk and enhancing operational efficiency. We use the power of data and advanced analytics to help our customers make better, timelier decisions. By bringing clarity to information, we ultimately help make communities safer, insurance rates more accurate, commerce more transparent, business decisions easier and processes more efficient. You can learn more about LexisNexis Risk at the link below, https://risk.lexisnexis.com/

About the team; This team is entrusted with the managing the decommissioning and shutdown of a legacy on-prem datacenter system as we evolve our Tech Stack.

About the role: This position serves as a subject matter expert for a specific team of Software Engineers. In addition to writing code on complex systems and applications, this position provides direction on project plans, schedules, and methodologies. The position has direct reports.

Responsibilities:

Coordinating internal projects and includes technical development responsibilities. Position will involve complex management oversight.Managing the decommissioning and shutdown of a legacy on-prem datacenter system. Overseeing the Engineering on-call support program, including engineering training and documentation improvements.Driving development responsibilities as assigned within an Azure cloud technology stack for a Kubernetes, Docker, MySQL, Java based system.Managing coordination will be needed in several areas such as: - Infosec report and customer audit support and Agile/Kanban tracking of system releases

Requirements:

 Possess advanced knowledge of software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall). Have experience with various resource models such as Managed Services and/or Staff Augmentation. Demonstrate knowledge in industry best practices in external resource development. Possess the ability to partner and lead internal and external technology resources in solving complex business needs. Experience with development languages including but not limited to: Java/J2EE, JavaScript, JSP,

LexisNexis® Risk Solutions is supportive of women in Technology and has been a founding signature for the Tech Talent Charter. We have the following initiatives in place to support women in technology:

 Mentoring scheme for women in technology, Women’s network forum, regularly run events for schools about careers in technology to inspire the next generation of girls in technology.

Learn more about the LexisNexis Risk team and how we work here

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Software Engineering Lead
output_json.summary: Lead role managing the decommissioning of a legacy datacenter system and overseeing a team of software engineers.
job_responsibilities: Managing the decommissioning and shutdown of a legacy on-prem datacenter system
Overseeing the Engineering on-call support program
Driving development responsibilities within an Azure cloud technology stack
Managing coordination in areas such as Infosec report and customer audit support, and Agile/Kanban tracking of system releases
output_json.company_information: LexisNexis® Risk Solutions provides solutions and decision tools combining public and industry-specific content with advanced technology and analytics to assist customers in evaluating and predicting risk and enhancing operational efficiency.
